721339f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 47th Street
721339f-a.text:
297 Madison Avenue, at S.E. corner of 47th Street, showing building
under construction. The open  of New York Central
Railroad in background were later built over. Building in back-
ground, seen through 47th Street, is the Grand Central Palace.
About 1922.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.  P BER0S

713289f-a.title: Manhattan: 47th Street - Madison Avenue
713289f-a.text:
47th Street, north side, west from and including Madison Avenue.
The tall building in the centre is 580 Fifth avenue at the N.W.
uorner of 47th Street.
April 4, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

721341f.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 47th Street (East)
721341f.text:
Madison Avenue at S.W. corner of 47th Street, showing the Ritr-
Carlton Hotel. The stores along the Madison Avenue front were
added to the building as alterations in 1921, when the Avenue
was widened.
1921-1922.
Cnift of E.M. Jenks.
MAY BE REPODUCED.

721343f-a.title: Manhattan: Madison Avenue - 47th Street (East)
721343f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, west side north from 47th Street. Shows buildings
between 49th and 50th Streets which were wrecked that summer,
and just beyond them may be seen the roof of the Lady Chapel
of St. Patrick's Cathedral.
April 27, 1930.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
NO REPRODUCIIONS.
